description: Right rear projector shows slight color imbalance in twilight conditions
Touchscreen intermittently requires double-tap on weather control panel
resolution_notes: Workaround: Use mouse. Replacement screen ordered

description: Captain's seat armrest fabric shows wear
resolution_notes: Non-safety item. Reupholstery scheduled for annual maintenance

description: Actuator #3 showing increased hydraulic pressure fluctuation
resolution_notes: Hydraulic servo valve replaced. System tested OK. QTG motion tests passed.

description: H2 fuel cell sound signature volume slightly low in left speaker zone
resolution_notes: Audio amplifier gain adjusted. Sound check passed.

description: IMA partition timing showing 15ms jitter under high load
resolution_notes: Software patch v2.5.1a applied. Timing now within specification.

description: Runway lighting intensity in foggy conditions 5% below specification
resolution_notes: Visual database updated to v4.3.0. Lighting now compliant.

description: Motion system emergency stop activated during session - hydraulic leak detected
resolution_notes: Hydraulic line replaced. System pressure tested. Full QTG motion suite re-executed and passed.
